snippet.title: The Wild Case Switch - Nintendo Switch trailer
snippet.description:
Nintendo Switch version will be released on March 8th! 

https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/the-wild-case-switch/

The Wild Case is a 2D first-person point-and-click adventure. 

Prepare for a journey to a remote village deep in the forest, where strange creatures with glowing eyes terrorize the inhabitants. As the hero, you will investigate eerie phenomena and be drawn deeper into the village.
